page.title: 12HEALTH - STRANRAER
page.content: Stranraer has{two hospitals - The {Garrick Hospital}which is a small {general hospital}and{Dalrymple {Hospital}which is a small{maternity {unit. The Garrick Hospital has{one surgeon and can cope with simple operations. For major operations the patient has to be taken to Dumfries, Ayr or Glasgow. Part of the Garrick Hospital is the local{Health Centre,}serving not only Stranraer but also the outlying villages. There are thirteen doctors who have their practice in the Health Centre. There are also dental, x-ray and physiotherapy units. The nearest children's hospital is in Ayr and the 'local' specialist clinics and hospitals e.g. mental, are found in{Dumfries.
